goals__remit: Backed by a movement of more than 9 million ONE members, ONE achieves change through advocacy. We hold world leaders to account for the commitments they've made to fight extreme poverty, and we campaign for better development policies, more effective aid and trade reform. We also support greater transparency and accountability to ensure policies to beat poverty are implemented effectively.
